attributes.action: Instruct the Office of Fair Trading to use their powers to compel banks and credit companies to automatically refund penalty charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law on penalty charges applicable to banks and credit companies is well established, yet the Office of Fair Trading continue to fail to take action. Affected customers currently have to endure a long process to reclaim these charges which often results in having to issue proceedings in court. This is creating a backlog in the court service and causing stress for those people involved which could be avoided if the OFT utilised their statutory powers.
